PPMonth.notes: Thanks to the [Chicago Puzzled Pint](https://twitter.com/puzzpintchi) organizers for writing all of this month's puzzles!

puzzle.title: Mazeophobia
puzzle.hint: Read the directions can have two different meanings.
Within each paragraph there are words that might indicate the direction to travel.
Not sure where to begin? What letter seems to stick out in the directions?

Read the directions and follow the path on the maze as indicated by the directions starting with R.
Direction words:
- Above - Beneath - Down - Left - Ported - Reverse - Right - Top - Underneath - Up
Got a message from the maze? Not sure what to do next? [This website](http://www.rot-n.com/) may help.

puzzle.title: Panphobia (meta puzzle)
puzzle.hint: The 8 hints in parentheses are short words, and the 8 definitions below are longer.
The solution to the top words are embedded in the solution to the bottom words

- Canine = DOG - Site = PLACE - Rod = BAR - Corn Holder = COB
- A person may do this on eBay = BID - Not a he or she = IT - Portrayer = ACTOR - Not you = ME
- Religious principles = DOGMA - Type of snake = COBRA - Extreme support = RABID - Carrier of cargo = BARGE
- Leave out = OMIT - Disease caused by insects = LYME - Home of nuclear energy = REACTOR - Harmless substance = PLACEBO

Insert the 4 meta answers into the slots so the parenthetical words + the adjacent two letters from the answer spell out one of the defined words from below. The letters that remain (from the middle of the 4 answer words) will spell SCARED STUPID.
